characterDescription: Teofil was a darkeyes in Dalinar's Ninth Division on Roshar.

characterDetails.Appearance: He appeared grizzled with a lean body, a thick neck, and was balding, his hair close-cropped.
characterDetails.Personality: He was a practical and calculated man who could be unhesitating in decision-making.
characterDetails.Character: He was both courageous and competent.
